scripts.build:portable:current: npm run build && tauri build --config src-tauri/tauri.portable.conf.json
scripts.build:portable:windows: npm run build && tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --config src-tauri/tauri.portable.conf.json
scripts.build:portable:linux: npm run build && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --config src-tauri/tauri.portable.conf.json
scripts.build:portable:macos-intel: npm run build && tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin --config src-tauri/tauri.portable.conf.json
scripts.build:portable:macos-arm: npm run build && tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin --config src-tauri/tauri.portable.conf.json
scripts.build:portable:macos: npm run build:portable:macos-intel && npm run build:portable:macos-arm
scripts.build:portable:all: npm run build:portable:windows && npm run build:portable:linux && npm run build:portable:macos
scripts.build:release: npm run clean:build && npm run build:portable:current && npm run package:current
scripts.build:release:all: npm run clean:build && npm run build:portable:all && npm run package:all
scripts.install:targets: rustup target add x86_64-pc-windows-msvc x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu x86_64-apple-darwin aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.prepare:release: npm run install:targets && npm run clean
